## Loading and preprocessing the data
```{r, echo=TRUE}
dat<-read.csv("activity.csv",colClasses="character")
dat1<-dat[!is.na(dat$steps),]
dat1$interval<-as.numeric(dat1$interval)
dat1$date<-as.Date(dat1$date)
dat1$steps<-as.numeric(dat1$steps)
```

## What is mean total number of steps taken per day?
```{r, echo=TRUE}
stepsDay<-aggregate(dat1$steps, by=list(dat1$date), FUN=sum)
names(stepsDay)<-c("date", "steps")

require(ggplot2)
qplot(stepsDay$steps, binwidth=5000)
mean(stepsDay$steps)
median(stepsDay$steps)
```


## What is the average daily activity pattern?
```{r, echo=TRUE}
activityDay<-aggregate(dat1$steps, by=list(dat1$interval), FUN=mean)
names(activityDay)<-c("interval", "steps")
qplot(activityDay$interval, activityDay$steps)+geom_line()
```

## Are there differences in activity patterns between weekdays and weekends?
```{r, echo=TRUE}
dat1$weekday<-weekdays(dat1$date)
dat1$weekend<-(dat1$weekday == "Saturday") | (dat1$weekday == "Sunday")
activityWeekend<-aggregate(dat1$steps, by=list(dat1$weekend, dat1$interval), FUN=mean)
names(activityWeekend)<-c("weekend", "interval", "steps")
qplot(activityWeekend$interval,activityWeekend$steps, color=activityWeekend$weekend)+geom_line()+geom_smooth()
```
